adrFormatAddress: 130 Baruch Pl, New York, NY 10003, USA

originalText.text: Terrible place filled with snakes and witches and warlocks like Julia Oosman, Angel Rivera Tracey and the entire staff. They hate God’s children and don’t help the people but do everything to make their lives hell. They do witchcraft on their clients and sabotage you if you aren’t easily fooled by their tactics or down with them and their practices. They set you up to fail and do everything to make you sign false documents to kick you out and send you back to PATH. Know your rights especially you children of God and stand up for yourselves and your rights. Jesus loves you and God Bless anyone who believes and reads my post. It’s all true and I have no reason to lie.I pray all who needs help make it through in this rough life. Peace and Love to all!

originalText.text: Don't care about what they are doing for you. Focus on you and getting a place of your own. A PLACE CALLED HOME.

text.text: Don't care about what they are doing for you. Focus on you and getting a place of your own. A PLACE CALLED HOME.

originalText.text:
I live there in 1991,, linzy was my worker ,when i live there i work in the mail room, i save my money so when i move out ..I could buy what I needed for my apartment... the people that was living there at the time we would go to groups meetings and there they useto teach us skills to find good jobs ,on holidays we would decorate the front of the shelter , we would keep it clean so it could look nice,, try your best to do ur days there , I useto live in the middle part..
don't let anyone know where u stay at..I want to go back to volunteer to help others the same way the shelter help me...
treat others good so the staff  would treat you nice too...god bless everyone that read my post

originalText.text: Their intentions of the workers definitely may not be wrong but their living conditions is hazardous ⚠️ I genuinely understand that shelters can get dirty or roaches here and there or a mouse. In the unit I was in it was water bugs and mice everyday since I’ve got here on 08/26 I’m ready to go from here I feel like it would’ve been an enjoyable experience but the overall conditions is becoming unbearable.  PS IM NOT SAYING I WANT A A1 SPIK & SPAN SHELTER ITS IMPOSSIBLE BUT I DO WANNA KNOW THAT MY DAUGHTER CAN ATLEAST PLAY WITH HER TOYS ON THE FLOOR WITH OUT A WATER BUG  CRAWLING ON HER A MICE TRYING TO PLAY WITH HER.

originalText.text: I have only been here as a volunteer, but it was a rewarding experience. If you want to get involved and help out your community, I would recommend joining New York Cares (it's free) and start volunteering.

text.text: I have only been here as a volunteer, but it was a rewarding experience. If you want to get involved and help out your community, I would recommend joining New York Cares (it's free) and start volunteering.
